snippet: Goaltender Jaroslav Halak earned his team-record-tying 10th straight to help the Islanders past visiting Ottawa.
abstract: NHL Roundup; St Louis Blues sign Martin Brodeur, NHL's career leader in wins, to a one-year contract; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Goaltender Jaroslav Halak earned his team-record-tying 10th straight to help the Islanders past visiting Ottawa.

headline.main: Halak’s 16 Saves Help Islanders Defeat Senators
headline.print_headline: Brodeur Signs With Blues; Islanders Defeat the Senators
